item.title: Global Head of Mergers & Acquisitions Mark McMaster on Bloomberg TV
item.description: On April 2, Global Head of Mergers & Acquisitions Mark McMaster appeared on Bloomberg TV's "Bloomberg Markets," to discuss the resurgence of all-stock deals, the willingness of private equity to be more active and his outlook for M&A.

item.title: Chief Market Strategist Ron Temple on CNBC Money Movers
item.description: Lazard Chief Market Strategist Ron Temple appeared on CNBC’s “Money Movers” on January 26, to discuss what to expect from the next Federal Reserve meeting, expectations around inflation, and what the Fed’s path looks like going forward.

item.title: Global Head of Mergers & Acquisitions Mark McMaster on Bloomberg TV
item.description: On April 2, Global Head of Mergers & Acquisitions Mark McMaster appeared on Bloomberg TV's "Bloomberg Markets," to discuss the resurgence of all-stock deals, the willingness of private equity to be more active and his outlook for M&A.

item.title: Capital Markets Advisory Managing Director Rich Thomas Appears on Bloomberg TV
item.description: On January 25, Capital Markets Advisory Managing Director Rich Thomas appeared on Bloomberg TV’s “Wall Street Beat” to discuss the increase of non-traditional shareholder activists launching first-time campaigns and the implications for companies.

item.title: Peter Orszag on CNBC’s Squawk Box
item.description: Lazard CEO discusses the U.S. presidential election and Federal Reserve interest rate policy.

item.title: Ray McGuire on Bloomberg’s Next Big Risk
item.description: Lazard President discusses the state of education in the United States and its impact on American competitiveness.
